name: UIPencilInteraction
desc: An interaction that tells your app the user double-tapped their Apple Pencil.

items.name: var delegate: UIPencilInteractionDelegate?
items.desc: The object that handles the double-tap interactions the user makes on their Apple Pencil.

items.name: protocol UIPencilInteractionDelegate
items.desc: The interface an object implements to handle double taps the user makes on their Apple Pencil.

items.name: var isEnabled: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that specifies whether the system reports double taps on Apple Pencil to your app.

items.desc: The preferred double-tap actions that a user can select from in the Settings app.
